mapper.sql: id AS id, meeting_id AS meetingId, channel_id AS channelId, start_time AS startTime, end_time AS endTime, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, user_create AS userCreate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_meeting_live_use_record ( id, meeting_id, channel_id, start_time, end_time, gmt_create, user_create ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{meetingId}, #{channelId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{gmtCreate}, #{userCreate} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tb_meeting_live_use_record WHERE meeting_id = #{meetingId} ORDER BY gmt_create DESC

SELECT
FROM tb_meeting_live_use_record WHERE channel_id = #{channelId} ORDER BY gmt_create DESC
